dialogueTree.title: Knick-knacks Stand: "To the left of the croissants and j..."
dialogueTree.text: To the left of the croissants and juice bottles, several packaged raincoats fill a low shelf. One is missing: the one you tried to steal, but then legally purchased.

dialogueTree.title: Knick-knacks Stand: "To the left of the croissants and j..."
dialogueTree.text: To the left of the croissants and juice bottles, several packaged raincoats fill a low shelf. One is missing. No one need be any wiser.

dialogueTree.title: Knick-knacks Stand: "To the left of the croissants and j..."
dialogueTree.text: To the left of the croissants and juice bottles, several packaged raincoats fill a low shelf. One, however, lies in the dusty floor: the one you tried and failed to steal.

links.title: Volition: "Look at it, detective. And be asham..."
links.text: Look at it, detective. And be ashamed. Until you make it right by *legally purchasing* that raincoat, I'll make sure you feel guilty every time you see it.

links.title: You: ""What's that?" (Point to the rainco..."
links.text: "What's that?" (Point to the raincoat.)

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""What is what?" The girl leans over..."
links.text: "What is what?" The girl leans over the counter to see what you're referring to. "Uhm... a raincoat? You know -- like the one you tried to steal earlier?"

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""What is what?" The girl leans over..."
links.text: "What is what?" The girl leans over the counter to see what you're referring to. "Uhm... a raincoat? You know -- like the one you bought earlier?"

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""What is what?" The girl leans over..."
links.text: "What is what?" The girl leans over the counter to see what you're referring to. "Uhm, it's a raincoat?"

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""If you want to buy one then it's o..."
links.text: "If you want to buy one then it's only four reál." She taps on the glass counter. The raincoats patiently await purchase.

links.title: Interfacing: "The sloppy stacking makes it more d..."
links.text: The sloppy stacking makes it more difficult to discern the missing one. You will be safe.

links.title: Interfacing: "Her attention is drawn to the rainc..."
links.text: Her attention is drawn to the raincoats. Stealing one undetected will now be more difficult.

links.title: You: ""I want to buy a raincoat.""
links.text: "I want to buy a raincoat."

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""Yes -- buy it, please, don't steal..."
links.text: "Yes -- buy it, please, don't steal it..." The clerk removes the garment from the dusty floor and hands it over.

links.title: Volition: "A wrong has been made right. You ma..."
links.text: A wrong has been made right. You may rest easy now.

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""Here you go." The clerk removes th..."
links.text: "Here you go." The clerk removes the garment from the lower shelf and hands it over.

links.title: Endurance: "This will keep you nice and warm ou..."
links.text: This will keep you nice and warm out there. Good choice, if a bit goofy looking...

links.title: You: "Steal a raincoat."
links.text: Steal a raincoat.

links.title: Interfacing: "The girl delves into the magazine,..."
links.text: The girl delves into the magazine, hair covering her face... vision obscured, she cannot see your hand move.

links.title: Interfacing: "Down onto one knee. Pretending to d..."
links.text: Down onto one knee. Pretending to do up a shoelace. Take a loose package from the bottom. Slip it in the old sleeve. The girl doesn't notice *a thing*.

links.title: Interfacing: "The girl delves into the magazine,..."
links.text: The girl delves into the magazine, hair covering her face... vision obscured, she cannot see your hand move.

links.title: You: "Try to grab a package. Any one of t..."
links.text: Try to grab a package. Any one of them. Slip it up your sleeve and...

links.title: Interfacing: "Oh no! I said *don't* let it fall o..."
links.text: Oh no! I said *don't* let it fall out with a thump! What did you do?

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""Um, did you..." The girl stares at..."
links.text: "Um, did you..." The girl stares at the package lying on the floor. It looks a little sad as it lies in the dusty floor.

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""I mean, I didn't just see a middle..."
links.text: "I mean, I didn't just see a middle-aged man try to steal a four reál raincoat, did I?"

links.title: You: ""No, you didn't. I didn't do it!""
links.text: "No, you didn't. I didn't do it!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Really? A *plastic poncho*?" The l..."
links.text: "Really? A *plastic poncho*?" The lieutenant sighs and looks away.

links.title: Frittte clerk: "The clerk stares at you, but doesn'..."
links.text: The clerk stares at you, but doesn't say a thing for a moment or two.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "She's like 14! You're humiliated in..."
links.text: She's like 14! You're humiliated in front of a minor, what's *wrong* with you, son?!

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""I mean, it doesn't even cost that..."
links.text: "I mean, it doesn't even cost that much... like, why would you want to 'fuck with Frittte' over something like this?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "She says 'fuck with Frittte' like i..."
links.text: She says 'fuck with Frittte' like it's a saying, or like she's quoting someone. Maybe you can ask her about this later?

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""Fucking with Frittte is *dangerous..."
links.text: "Fucking with Frittte is *dangerous*, you know." She scratches her cheek, thinking. "Just leave it there, I'll put it away later."

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry... I'm such a mess latel..."
links.text: "I'm sorry... I'm such a mess lately..."

links.title: You: ""Don't judge me. I needed it for an..."
links.text: "Don't judge me. I needed it for an official police investigation."

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Knick-knacks Stand: "To the left of some croissants and..."
dialogueTree.text: To the left of some croissants and juice bottles, you see several packaged raincoats fill a low shelf. One is missing: the one you legally purchased.

dialogueTree.title: Knick-knacks Stand: "You see several packaged raincoats..."
dialogueTree.text: You see several packaged raincoats fill a low shelf beneath a display of croissants and juice bottles. The raincoats are transparent, except for the big 'FRITTTE' slogan on the back.

links.title: Interfacing: "The packages are small. Discreet. S..."
links.text: The packages are small. Discreet. Sloppily stacked, making them easier to take unnoticed -- no need to worry about knocking over a display.
